name: It raining Maigritte Man
description:
Shoot everything in sight and have a lot of fun. Survive for the longest and score the highest,

… and he dreamed that bad stuff fell from the sky.
Welcome to the first surrealist shooter. Have fun while achieving a high score by blowing up stuff.
You can blow up stuff with a choice of weapons that you select using the F1 key.
Don’t stay in one place. Move using the usual W, A, S, D keys for forward, left, back and right movement. If you use the SHIFT key with the movement keys you will move faster.
Pickup boxes for ammo. Be sure to pickup bonus multipliers and casino chips for extra score. Not everything that you blow to smitherins will score points but be sure it will be fun.
